title: Emerald and Diamond Bridal Haaram - Pancharatna Shobha
materials: set in a meticulously crafted design. Features stunning
ethically sourced Emeralds totaling 16.55 carats. The base metal is likely a high purity White Gold
potentially with a platinum finish for enhanced brilliance and durability. Each stone is hand-selected for its exceptional color and clarity.
features: This breathtaking Haaram features an intricate floral design meticulously set with diamonds, highlighting the vibrant Emeralds. The design incorporates a symmetrical layout, gradually increasing in grandeur towards the center, where three striking pear-shaped Emerald pendants create a focal point. The setting appears to be a combination of prong and pave, allowing maximum light to enter each gemstone for enhanced sparkle.
colors: The color palette is a sophisticated combination of icy white diamonds and vivid green Emeralds. This contrasts beautifully against the likely white gold or platinum setting
creating a regal and timeless aesthetic.
occasions: Perfect for a grand Indian wedding
especially the muhurtham ceremony. Also ideal for Seemantham (baby shower)
or any significant celebration where a statement piece is desired. Can also be worn for modern events where you want to showcase a piece of exquisite heritage and luxury.
description: This is more than just jewelry; it's an heirloom. This Haaram represents the finest traditions of Indian craftsmanship, blended with a contemporary design sensibility. The exceptional quality of the diamonds and Emeralds, coupled with the intricate setting, makes this a truly rare and valuable piece. Its timeless design ensures it will be treasured for generations to come. The dazzling brilliance and the rich green hues of the Emeralds symbolize prosperity and new beginnings, making it the perfect adornment for life's most special moments.
